## AsyncFunction

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/context/async-context.ts" sourceLine="31" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents an async function that can be cached

```ts title="Signature"
type AsyncFunction<R extends any[] = any[], T = any> = (
  ...args: R
) => Promise<T>
```
